entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as sitting at the edge of the pitch.

entities.name: mc laggen
entities.description: McLaggen is mentioned as being in the hospital wing and eating Doxy eggs for a bet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as pointing to the edge of the pitch where Hermione was sitting.

entities.name: doxy eggs
entities.description: Doxy eggs are mentioned as being eaten by McLaggen for a bet.

entities.name: pitch
entities.description: The pitch is mentioned as the location where Harry and the applicants were testing their flying skills.

relationships.description: Harry pointed to the edge of the pitch, close to where Hermione was sitting.
Hermione was sitting at the edge of the pitch, near Harry.
McLaggen ate a pound of Doxy eggs for a bet.
Harry tested the applicants' flying skills on the pitch.
